title: Top Places to visit in Dhubri, Assam
content: Dhubri (Pron: ˈdhʊbri) (Assamese:ধুবৰী) is the headquarter of Dhubri district (Assam) India. It is an old town on the bank of the Brahmaputra river, with historical significance. In 1883, the town was first constituted as a Municipal Board under British regime. It is situated about 277.4 kilometr
